**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title and Reference**
------------------------

* **English Title:** Heavy Vehicle Transmission Inspection, Repair and Spare Parts Services
* **French Title:** Services d' inspection, de réparation et de pièces de rechange pour transmission - véhicules lourds
* **Reference Number:** WS4417957749
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** 2024-03-25

**Procurement Details**
-----------------------

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Québec
* **Regions of Delivery:** Québec

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Contract Duration:** 2026-04-22 (with the possibility of being extended)

**Service Requirements**
-----------------------

* The contractor is expected to provide diagnostic/estimation, repair/reconditioning and replacement parts services for transmissions, various types of clutches, transfer cases, and differentials for heavy vehicles on an as-and-when-requested basis.
* The contractor must provide pick-up and delivery of the transmission, clutch, transfer case, or differential entrusted to him for repair.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contact Person:** Annie Deslauriers
* **Contact Email:** annie.deslauriers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Documentation**
----------------

* The full solicitation document can be found at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19203837?extsite=MTkyMDM4MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
